# nottshcPublic

The goal of nottshcPublic is to ...

## Installation

You can install the released version of nottshcPublic from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("nottshcPublic")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(nottshcPublic)
## basic example code
```

### Connect to database

```{r}
conn_mysql_suce <- connect_mysql(database = "SUCE")
```
### Get data

```{r}
db_px_data <- get_px_exp(open_data = TRUE)
db_px_data
```

### Tidy data

```{r}
db_px_data_tidy <- db_px_data %>% 
  tidy_px_exp()

db_px_data_tidy
```
